## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`rke`](#rke): Install RKE binary

## Classes

### <a name="rke"></a>`rke`

Install RKE binary

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `rke` class:

* [`version`](#-rke--version)
* [`checksum`](#-rke--checksum)
* [`checksum_type`](#-rke--checksum_type)
* [`base_path`](#-rke--base_path)

##### <a name="-rke--version"></a>`version`

Data type: `String`

RKE release version

Default value: `'1.3.4'`

##### <a name="-rke--checksum"></a>`checksum`

Data type: `String`

Artifact checksum string

Default value: `'92440ec62468d329ca26829b2a1d5624aa7a5d37054596633e4e838549a22946'`

##### <a name="-rke--checksum_type"></a>`checksum_type`

Data type: `String`

The digest algorithm used for the checksum string.

Default value: `'sha256'`

##### <a name="-rke--base_path"></a>`base_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`

Base path under which to install software.

Default value: `'/opt/rke'`
